c2.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos

c3.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lemniscatic Wind Cycling** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
c4.effect: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

c5.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
c5.effect:

Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
c6.effect: While under the effects of **Bane of All Evil**, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of **Lemniscatic Wind Cycling**, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
